textos_fuente.text: CAMP STORE - TOMOKA OUTPOSTCamp Store, Rentals, Boat Tours, Snacks & Beverages Home CAMP STORE RENTALS BOAT TOURS CONTACT EVENTS Camp Store The "Camp Store & More" is a place where campers and visitors alike can visit during regular business hours. ‚Äã HOURS OF OPERATION: Current Hours: Sunday 9am-5pm Monday 9am-5pm Tuesday 9am-5pm *Wednesday CLOSED (Camp store & Rentals Closed) Thursday 9am-5pm Friday 9am-5pm Saturday 9am-5pm *Kayak/Canoe rentals must return by 4:30pm at the latest ‚Äã *All days/hours are weather permitting ***Always check our Facebook page for updates or special hours notices/changes. Tomoka Outpost | Facebook __________________________________ Check this out... The camp store has been a place for everyone to gather, grab a snack, soda, water, beer or wine, Cup-ah Cajun and relax in the air-conditioned building overlooking the beautiful Tomoka River, pick up firewood, frozen bait, camping/outdoors necessities and even purchase a neat souvenir to take home. If you haven't been by in a while, we've definitely added some new stuff! Rocking chairs overlooking the Tomoka River, Tall chairs on the back patio, the "Crow's Nest" and we've begun "setting sail" on the riverside patio with our awesome shade covered countertop area. We've turned an old sailboat into a neat riverside hangout table, added more posts and a museum like countertop with some unique history.¬† Tomoka Outpost has a complete and real dungeon along with many other new additions you may or may not notice...but we're constantly improving for you! Most recently, we've completed our 3 "building long" countertops overlooking the Tomoka River made with salvaged dock wood Capt. Scott got from the islands in the river after hurricanes Mathew and Irma.¬† You'll be able to shop, sip and enjoy the absolutely beautiful views from our air-conditioned building. ‚ÄãThere's a looong list of new additions to come but like we always say, "little by little." Please give us a call (386-673-0022) or shoot us an email ( tomokaoutpost@aol.com ) to share your ideas and what you'd like to see at the Tomoka Outpost! Home CAMP STORE RENTALS BOAT TOURS CONTACT EVENTS

Learn more ‚Üí Others Additional features such as leave and vacation management, risk management, detailed issue tables, workload distribution, comprehensive reporting, teamboard, scheduling,‚Ä¶ Let Our Customers Speak for Us! TimePlanner manages the application costs and consumption of materials within the project Claudio Pirtraroia on Atlassian Marketplace After a long search, found a right one shop tool that gives me insights on Workload, What is being allocated and time spent. Jacob Rajesh on Atlassian Marketplace Lovely app and great customer service. This app is very useful for us to plan resource and tasks for projects and portfolios. Look forward to the completed Gantt features and project budget management as you guys promised. Highly recommend. Hakan Eriksson on Atlassian Marketplace Beautiful app! fancy scheduler and modern UIUX, I strongly recommend this over other expensive legacy timesheets apps. Brian Ng on Atlassian Marketplace The app looks promising I have just installed it today and starting to discover it‚Äôs features. One thing I couldn‚Äôt find a way around is cancelling an Approved Vacation or changing it‚Äôs period range, it will be awesome if such option is available. Badry Hassan on Atlassian Marketplace I am using this app daily to manage my team and very satisfied with its capabilities. Support guys are very nice and normally response instantly. Keep up a good work the Samurais! Nathan Carter on Atlassian Marketplace Integrates with Multiple Platforms Integrates seamlessly with Atlassian , monday.com , and Salesforce environments and offers a centralized platform for managing tasks, projects, and resources effectively. VAT ¬£ inc.VAT Options Colour: Black Back Panel White Back Panel Clear Back Panel Clear Frost Back Panel Coloured Back Panel 2: 2: Qty Add to basket Get a quote Staff Photo Notice Boards - Perspex Acrylic Staff photo notice boards, or "Meet The Team" boards are a perfect way of letting people know who's who in a school, NHS Wards, general office and commercial workplace, recreation centres, reception areas, etc. Each clear pocket allows a small photo of a relevent member of staff. Options available include: choice of back acrylic colour, the number of photo pockets. We also offer a secure, tamper proof version, please click here for further details. NEW! We can now offer staff boards with your name and logo printed directlty to the top of the display - call for details. Features and Benefits: Please double click on the above images of our acrylic staff photo boards to zoom into a more detailed view Staff photo boards provide a professioal looking wall mounted display panel for quick reference of staff / team members Choice of black, white, clear or clear frost 5mm thick acrylic back panel with polished edges. Corners are rounded with no sharp edges Clear acrylic photo pockets allow staff photos to be changed quickly and easily Supplied with 4 polished sign fittings to give that floating effect off a wall Each photo pocket size is 75mm high x 50mm wide Header panel pocket is 260mm wide x 50mm high Please see the table below for our standard sized staff photo boards. We also manufacture custom sized boards if you require different sized pockets or different quantities of pockets - please call us on 01202 480104 for further details. Staff photo board prices are detailed in the drop down menu at the top of the page. Manufactured to order in our factory in Christchurch, Dorset, UK. Please allow 5 working days for delivery Please see our stand off fittings instructions by clicking here Looking for a a more secure staff photo board which can't be tampered with? Check out our Secure Staff Photo Boards ! Looking for a staff photo board with a different coloured back panel? We have a range of colours available other than our standard colours listed! Please contact us for a quote. Looking for a staff photo board with bespoke printing and branding to suit your business? With state of the art printers, we are able to fully print or brand these staff boards with your logos and messages! If this is something you are interested in, contact us for a quote! 673-0022 Visit Website Email Share About Located inside the beautiful Tomoka State Park, Tomoka Outpost is "A True Outpost" by definition, history and expectations. Enjoy an ice-cold soda, snacks, adult beverages (beer/wine) including local craft beer on tap, and their famous Cup-ah Cajun with a fantastic view! Melt into a comfy rocking chair and soak up the sights and sounds of the amazing Tomoka River. The Tomoka Outpost offers single kayaks, double kayaks and canoe rentals, private guided pleasure cruises, custom excursions, guided date night boat rides and riverfront restaurant hopping (all by advanced reservation). Choose from a one and a half hour pleasure cruise to a week-long camping excursion along the Intracoastal Waterway. Call for pricing and availability. Contact Tomoka Outpost for operarting hours. Outpost Team - The Outpost Skip to content Home What We Do For Companies For Government Outpost Ventures Team/Careers Outpost Team Advisory Council Strategic Partnerships Careers See Open Roles Events/News Resources FAQs Webinars and Blog Outpost Swag Contact Us Home What We Do For Companies For Government Outpost Ventures Team/Careers Outpost Team Advisory Council Strategic Partnerships Careers See Open Roles Events/News Resources FAQs Webinars and Blog Outpost Swag Contact Us Leadership Team Dave Harden Founder Dave is a retired Air Force colonel, was COO & Architect of AFWERX, and Chief of Strategic Prioritization at the Pentagon. Dave has held tech, non-profit, and manufacturing CEO & COO roles. He has early and growth stage capital stack experience. Dave holds a MBA from George Washington University, a BS in Electrical Engineering from the USAFA, and Executive Certifications in Strategy from MIT and University of Virginia. Linh Hoang Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Linh is a management professional and expert startup advisor whose tools are communication, collaboration, information synthesis, and curiosity. Previously, Linh worked in process and system implementations with Accenture and IBM and is currently a board member of the Virginia Small Business Financing Authority. Linh holds a BA in Management and International Business from Georgetown University. Joey Arora President Joey is a startup founder and ecosystem builder with a passion for connecting entrepreneurs to government opportunities. Previously, Joey was the Chief Scaling Officer at Platform One and a pioneer of the innovation ecosystems at AFWERX and AFVentures. Joey holds a MS in Organizational Leadership from Colorado State University and a BA in Business Administration from University of Colorado at Boulder. Scott Arenholz Chief Financial Officer (CFO) Scott is a finance, accounting & management professional with expertise in developing and implementing financial strategies aligned with organizational goals, driving profitability, and sustainable growth. He has over twenty years demonstrated history of helping small businesses in the GovCon tech space to evolve, scale and grow their finance and accounting functions. Scott holds a BS in Business Administration from Bucknell University. Jacquelyn Charters Chief People Officer (CPO) Jacquelyn has years of business ownership, executive experience and deep understanding of business, marketing and finance. She has helped grow businesses by finding new opportunities, researching leads and establishing relationships with potential clients, government officials and commercial deals. Jacquelyn holds a BA in Business Administration from Missouri State University. Team Outpost Mike Brown VP, Account Manager Keith Michel VP, Federal Civilian Senior Account Manager Steven Mundy VP, Account Manager Chase Eiserman Director of Strategic Accounts & Acquisitions Mike Bynum Account Manager Adam Sweet Account Manager Swapna Kulkarni Senior Director of Innovation & AI Strategy Cari Kish Director of Marketing & Corporate Affairs Marti Golon Creative Director Grant Glavin Proposal Writer Brody Ferris Operations Technical Lead Sam Perry Software Engineer Laura Nelson Sales Development Representative Jess Boyd Federal Portfolio Engagement Representative Advisory Council Dr. Ravi Chaudhary Alex Wagner Austin DeLorme Randy "Laz" Gordon Zachary Burke Angela Donahoo Jason Bailey Chris Spinelli Patrick T. O'Connor Telly Renfroe Adam Goldberg Strategic Partnerships No Company Scales Alone At The Outpost, we know our clients face challenges that extend beyond our core offerings. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôve built a trusted network of strategic partners to fill the critical gaps‚Äîso founders can stay focused on building, growing, and delivering. These partnerships are not just names on a website‚Äîthey‚Äôre real collaborators helping our clients navigate federal markets, secure funding, and scale with purpose. Interested in Partnering? We‚Äôre always looking to expand our network with mission-aligned organizations who share our commitment to accelerating dual-use innovation. If you‚Äôre a firm helping venture-backed companies succeed in defense and national security‚Äîlet‚Äôs talk. Reach out to explore partnership opportunities CAREERS Join Our Team Getting tech delivered to our nation is no easy feat ‚Äì it takes a team. We work hard, have lots of white board brainstorm sessions, make jokes, and, ultimately, work together to fulfill our mission of Doing Good.
